attributes.action: move the statue of Emmeline Pankhurst from Victoria Tower Gardens to Parliament Square
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the contribution to universal suffrage made by Emmeline Pankhurst, her statue should be in a far more prominent position.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Greater London Authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
